headline.main: Asian Shares Hit Two-Month High After Solid U.S. Job Growth
headline.print_headline: Asian Shares Hit Two-Month High After Solid U.S. Job Growth

docs.snippet: Asian shares hit two-month highs on Monday, extending sharp gains from last week, following upbeat U.S. jobs data and a rebound in oil and commodity prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Asian shares hit two-month highs on Monday, extending sharp gains from last week, following upbeat U.S. jobs data and a rebound in oil and commodity prices.

headline.main: China's CO2 Emissions May Have Peaked in 2014-Study
headline.print_headline: China's CO2 Emissions May Have Peaked in 2014-Study

docs.snippet: China's carbon emissions, by far the world's highest, may have peaked in 2014, according to a study published on Monday,  potentially putting Beijing under pressure to toughen its climate pledges....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's carbon emissions, by far the world's highest, may have peaked in 2014, according to a study published on Monday,  potentially putting Beijing under pressure to toughen its climate pledges.

headline.main: Zhong Gold Underlines Chinese Threat in Rio
headline.print_headline: Zhong Gold Underlines Chinese Threat in Rio

docs.snippet: A few days after breaking his hand in rage when China were denied gold on a technicality, coach Benoit Vetu was raising it in triumph after Zhong Tianshi became the first Chinese rider to be crowned world sprint champion on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A few days after breaking his hand in rage when China were denied gold on a technicality, coach Benoit Vetu was raising it in triumph after Zhong Tianshi became the first Chinese rider to be crowned world sprint champion on Sunday.

headline.main: Brad Keselowski Passes Kyle Busch Late to Win at Las Vegas
headline.print_headline: Brad Keselowski Passes Kyle Busch Late to Win at Las Vegas

docs.snippet: Brad Keselowski spent nearly a full year winless and watching while Team Penske teammate Joey Logano went to Victory Lane five times....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski spent nearly a full year winless and watching while Team Penske teammate Joey Logano went to Victory Lane five times.

headline.main: Kyrgios Hits Back at Tomic in Davis Cup Row
headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Hits Back at Tomic in Davis Cup Row

docs.snippet: Nick Kyrgios has hit back at Bernard Tomic after his compatriot accused him of feigning illness to skip Australia's Davis Cup match against the United States at the weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios has hit back at Bernard Tomic after his compatriot accused him of feigning illness to skip Australia's Davis Cup match against the United States at the weekend.

docs.snippet: ZARUCKI--Rose. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of our devoted long-time member, Rose Zarucki, beloved wife of the late Charles Zarucki, mother of Betsy Zarucki and Judith Zarucki, grandmother and great- grandmother. Heartfelt sympathy to th...
docs.lead_paragraph:
ZARUCKI--Rose. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of our devoted long-time member, Rose Zarucki, beloved wife of the late Charles Zarucki, mother of Betsy Zarucki and Judith Zarucki, grandmother and great- grandmother. Heartfelt sympathy to the entire family.

Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President

docs.snippet: GARNETT--Donald Irwin, passed away on March 1. He was the inventor of Energy Generation Using Continental Shelf Mass: a technology which generates electricity by recovering the potential energy accumulated by the movement of the Earth's tectonic p...
docs.lead_paragraph:
GARNETT--Donald Irwin,

passed away on March 1. He was the inventor of Energy Generation Using Continental Shelf Mass: a technology which generates electricity by recovering the potential energy accumulated by the movement of the Earth's tectonic plates. Patent 8258638, issued September 4, 2012.

docs.snippet: BALLON--Harriet. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member, Harriet Ballon and extend sincerest condolences to her bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BALLON--Harriet.

We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member, Harriet Ballon and extend sincerest condolences to her bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City

docs.snippet: DUDA--Edward L., passed away on March 5, 2016. Beloved son of the late Bertha and Edward Duda. Loving companion of Melinda. Edward was a long time Funeral Director at Frank E. Campbell, "The Funeral Chapel". Visitation will be held at Frederick Fu...
docs.lead_paragraph:
DUDA--Edward L.,

passed away on March 5, 2016. Beloved son of the late Bertha and Edward Duda. Loving companion of Melinda. Edward was a long time Funeral Director at Frank E. Campbell, "The Funeral Chapel". Visitation will be held at Frederick Funeral Home Flushing, NY on Monday 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Mass of Christian Burial will be held on Tuesday at 9:30am at St. Ann's Church Flushing, NY. Interment to follow at Flushing Cemetery, Flushing, NY.

docs.snippet: BALLON--Harriet. Rest in peace my beautiful, dear friend. I will miss you. Dolores...
docs.lead_paragraph:
BALLON--Harriet.

Rest in peace my beautiful, dear friend. I will miss you. Dolores
